Description: This amazing 2nd floor 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom rental is conveniently located on the west side of South Boston, less than a mile from the Seaport, only steps to dining and shopping, and a quick walk to the Broadway MBTA Station! This unit boasts gleaming hardwood floors, granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, AND a wood burning fireplace! The large master bedroom also includes a spacious custom closet and it's own access to the deck! Skip the laundromat - this unit also includes laundry facilities in the basement! Call or text for this great rental!
